task.title: Place Ribbon Spools on Spool Shafts
task.shortdesc: You can place your new ink spools onto your typewriters' spool shafts to begin the ribbon installation process.

step.cmd: Place one of your new ribbon spools onto a ribbon spool shaft. Ensure that your spool shaft pin fits into the designated slot on the new ribbon spool.
Ensure that the ribbon coming off of the spool is directed toward the back of the typewriter and is not twisted.
Carefully slide the ribbon into the auto-reverse bracket directly next to the metal spool shaft.
Repeat for your second ribbon spool.
